name: 葉采青
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
週次	Reading Explorer 2	Impact Listening
1.		Intro week
2.		Sweet Scents	Living Situation
3.		Sweet Scents	Living Situation
4.		Great Explorers	Survival
5.		Great Explorers	Survival
6.		Traditions and Rituals	Work
7.		Traditions and Rituals	Work
8.		Review 3 Cities of Gold and Mud	Review
9.		Midterm
10.		Global Warming	Lifestyle
11.		Global Warming	Lifestyle
12.		Incredible Insects	Travel
13.		Incredible Insects	Travel
14.		Going to Extremes	Finances
15.		Going to Extremes	Finances
16.		Review 4 The Grand Canyon	Changes
17.		Term Review 	Changes
18.		Final
scorePolicy:
B.各班正規課程成績 = 出席*10%+平時成績*30%+期中考試*30%+期末考試*30%
C.期中會考測驗成績
D.期末會考測驗成績
E.學期總成績= B*70%+C*15%+ D*15%
